name: Tracker
description: This algorithm tracks the pitch and envelope of an audio signal, which are output as CVs. It can also generate chords to harmonise with the tracked pitch â€“ either as pitch CVs (to drive VCOs etc.) or as pitch shifter CVs (to drive the Pitch Shifter, to make harmony copies of the tracked audio). The chords can be tuned microtonally using Scala or MTS.
use_cases: Live performance pitch tracking for modular synths
Automated chord generation from monophonic input
CV control of VCOs based on tracked audio
gui_description: The display shows the tracked note at the bottom (MIDI note number, cents deviation, frequency in Hz) alongside an envelope visualization. Above this are the closest scale note and four generated harmony notes.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: Sets the range of pitches which can be tracked. Set this appropriately for the lowest note that you need to track.

parameters.name: Track bias (dB)
parameters.description: Sets a signal threshold below which no attempt is made to track pitch.

parameters.name: MIDI channel
parameters.description: Sets the MIDI channel on which to receive notes if the harmony mode is 'MIDI'.

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: The audio input bus for pitch and envelope tracking.

output_ports.name: Pitch output
output_ports.description: Outputs the tracked pitch as a CV signal.

output_ports.name: Env output
output_ports.description: Outputs the detected envelope as a CV signal.

output_ports.name: Change trigger out
output_ports.description: Emits a trigger pulse when the current tracked note changes.

output_ports.name: Chord 1 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV output bus for the first chord note.

output_ports.name: Chord 2 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV output bus for the second chord note.

output_ports.name: Chord 3 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV output bus for the third chord note.

output_ports.name: Chord 4 output
output_ports.description: Pitch CV output bus for the fourth chord note.

output_ports.name: Shift 1 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV output bus for the first pitch shifter.

output_ports.name: Shift 2 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV output bus for the second pitch shifter.

output_ports.name: Shift 3 output
output_ports.description: Pitch shift CV output bus for the third pitch shifter.
